google_play_reviews.content: It works. Finding the correct directory is tricky.
This app is gospel
Don't know yet.. haven't used it yet.
It's ok for main storage access only
Confusing?

Ad-free, fast. I like the text UI. If you only added a "Log to screen" option to the "Log" settings item for displaying the FTP commands directly on the screen, it would be just perfect. :-) A bit troublesome experience on Android 12 due to the limited file access on these new Androids. I solved it by creating a folder "data_exchange" in the root and set this as a root folder for pFTPd.

I know it's not a popular.. You can't find a single page or a youtube video talking about this app. But trust me it's the best FTP app. It's open source, free, zero data collection. Works like charm even get more speed than other paid app. So, go for it. SUPPORT THE DEVELOPER IF YOU CAN.
Best ftpd

Does what it says, and does it well. Pro-tip: for a truly seamless experience (at least when transfering from PC -> Android), use this app in conjunction with WinSCP's ability to add a shortcut to the Windows "Send To" context menu.

Primitive? This app succeeded where the last one I had failed because this one has better storage support! The name can be a little misleading because the options are quite extensive. This is now my favorite FTP server app for Android! Free of the USB cable at last!
Thanks a lot for this wonderful app, which help me to turn my Android TV 📺 to a FTP server!!
It's been running fine. I would prefer if the panel showed current start server directory with other settings. Recommended!
Free and ads-free, practical and versatile. Would be better if support the option of other encodings though, as I sometimes have the need of transferring files with multilingual name.
useful app to make instant ftp access
It's not primitive unless you are scared of a UI that looks like it's text-only.
Amazing
A simple yet working fine ftp app. Exactly what I look for. No ads
Amazing! I was able to use FTP to transfer files wirelessly from my PC to my phone. Thanks!
Not working Forceclose on my old device
No ads, no clutter. Simple app for creating FTP server
refuses to do basic task FoR yOuR sEcUrItY. Let me do what i want to do on my secured network, would you?
Can't connect in pc file explorer win10
It just works, without fuss, without nonsense. Yay!
Simple, and it works. Unlike the last six I have tried. Thanks.
Can't Open Passive Connection
Doesn't work. Only allows read-only ftp.
Simple and effective. Works perfectly.
Using winscp on a PC both sftp and ftp transfers are working well. Reading and writing to internal storage and the micro SDHC card work reliably.
Simple and powerful. An amazing work.
There is a mistake in the settings: Server Idle Timeout is setting a timeout in milliseconds, not seconds.
Simple and not too bloated. Does exactly what the name says, runs reliable and without interruptions. Perfect!
If only all apps were this good. Thanks.
The only FTP server application that runs perfectly on my smartphone. Awesomazing. My huge thank to the developer.
Easy to use and saved the day :)
I really love the simplicity and reliability of this app. Please keep these characteristics intact, do not lose it with upgrades. If only you could develop multiple file renaming app like this.

This is the exact thing i was looking for. I purchased some apps but none are better than this. It is far better than the paid alternatives. Thank you so much dev😃. Please add option to.add multiple users or just two: one for anonymous(public) and one for authenticated user.
Thank you for this good app..

Since Ver. 6.7 (Dec. release) the server abruptly exits when start server button is pressed. This happens only with public key authentication method. With Ver. 6.6 (apk download over internet) it works ok.
It's simple, primitive, it works, and it's open source... What else can you ask for?
Thank you very much. Perfect application to use.
Perfect and simple tool
Easy way to share files between my computer and my phone. This app on my phone and FileZilla on my computer. And it's open source!
A great open source app. Also great experience so far. However, polishing the overall look might be nice! :)
Great application.

Only 1 star short of AMAZING !!! Why do we have to provide access to external SD card each time we want to transfer a file from PC to phone (inside external SD card's folder only). Hope the developer replies.
please fix this annoying bug that whenever I open the settings and scroll it randomly changes my preferences
Thanks, you made my life easy.
tried lots of other ftp server apps that may also pretend to have root support but this is by far the best.. the amount of additional available settings is just amazing 👍
The best , essential for me
Excellent
Works well, even supporting sftp with public key, but it insists on continuing to run in the background when off, using resources when it doesn't need to.
light, efficient, does just what it should to. Really the best.
Love this ftp server app.. Still using it.. :))
Lightweight, efficient, functional, ad-free and free to use. Not at all pretty but I like it - who needs an FTP server to be pretty? :-)
Awesome, works perfect
Amazing
After an update, now moronically gives itself a public IP address. So worthless.
Very nice app, simple and doing just what it says it does.
I've been using this app for years and it just keeps working.
Could not connect to server directory.
Sometimes the simplest one is all you need.
Finally just in time for HogGin woo
Nice and useful.
Working as it should be. Great job
Works great. Unlike other apps I tried, this works with Windows command line FTP, which I think means it supports active mode.
only lets me share archives, will not allow me to view files insid3 them. useless.
Very simple to use and works like a charm!
This ftpd server worked great on my Nintendo switch.
Please, remove "primitive" word from app's name. This app is fully functional and good. Thank you for your job!
Nothing primitive about this app. This is 2019, this FTPd offers SECURE FTP. Do not waste your time and money on apps that don't. THIS APP SHOULD NOT BE FREE!
Best stable ftp server with good preferences
Open Source... Made in Germany-Quality. Just Perfect !
it worked
Its simple, fast and straightforward. No ads.
Super convenient and easy to use. Now using it as my primary way to transfer files from/to my phone from my PC.
Have been using it for a long time. Installed it on every Android device since. Excellent piece of software.
Like in the old days, no adds, simply does what it suppose to do, free open source softwarez, long live tha linux :-)
Functionally I like this app a lot. It does exactly what it's supposed to. However the app interface is cluttered and plain ugly so this could need some improvements.

One of the best FTP servers for Android. It even offers SFTP, although I don't have write permissions through SFTP on Android 8 on my SD-Card for some reason (FTP works fine, writing through SFTP on Android 6 works fine as well)
Has the features I needed (start on boot, etc.) and ones I didn't think I needed (IP address displayed when tethering to PC).
Being able to run without root is great. Not being able to run with root is not great at all.
Very good app. Does exactly as described.

Simplistically and beautifully done. It never fails and super easy to setup and use. Could be more useful if we can somehow restrict the FTP directory to a particular folder. And sharing with friends in a group becomes easier and safer.
Great app
Very Usefull App! No ad and wow this powerful FTP Sharing is open source. Hope i always see future deveplopment from you.
Well done! What a nice app! Waiting for you to add some more features 😁😁😁 if help is needed contact me!
Wonderful app. Open source and works great.
Great FTP/SFTP server. Works with SD cards. thank you Deceloper(s)
Had to uninstall it as it could not handle directories with loads of files.
Excellent app, very convenient to use!
I use it on Android TV 8 with ext HDD. It works in RO. How to RW?

Server returns internal IP address (not external) so don't work on passive 
mode, or is there an option to make this work?

It's an excellent that it's open source and has a wide range features sadly 
a lot of them just don't work. Though to be honest a lot of that is 
Google's fault for screwing up memory card support (it's got to have been 
intentionally done). And making the storage access framework which 
absolutely does not work on any device or application I've ever used it on. 
Sadly this application is no different in that SAF does not work. normally 
I'd circumvent that with root if the app supports it, but the root mode in 
this app doesn't seem to work either. Like all these android FTP servers 
hanging during file transfer is a serious problem and a fatal one if your 
ftp client doesn't have a transfer (and error) queue, which no Android app 
that I know of has at all.

Thank you! This simple server is the only one to work with SD card (through 
SAF) on Lineage OS. You little ripper!
Amazing app! Open-source and fully functional. Great option to bypass SAF, helped with slowdowns on uploads. Thanks!
Probably the best ftp server, ad-free and fully functional. Mobile data ftp connection really ROCKS and everything else on the server!! Open source the best forever!!!
It does work. SSH FTP with Oreo. Great job!
started to look very promising, but after first transfer stopped working, always giving errors.

Finally! Root access with sftp and external sdcard access! I have only one more wish: Whats about a multi-user support? But this is exactly what I searched for hours (because no app supports sftp AND root). Wounderfull!
Very useful app! It even includes a handy quick settings toggle!
Good app but old versions you could type the server start directory which I preferred. Also now there are too many shortcuts on my apps list of this.
Please remove the two additional annoying shortcuts or make them optional in settings.
External sd access broken.

This app has the potential to become my default (S)FTP-server for my S8+. It's just that I can't make it work with my external SD : I haven't been able to upload / download files from the ext. SD. This is a real breaker for me. It can be Nougat (Android 7.0) specific, donno for sure.     It mentions something about permission that can be revoked from time to time and gives even an SAF URI to restore these permissions :   content://com.android.externalstorage.documents/tree/0000-0000%3A         but where should I write this URI ??
Simple ftp
Just works.
Awesome server no ads highly recommended

Anyone rating less than 4 stars should find a paid alternative and use it instead...we don't need your poor rating. It's open source, fast, feature rich for a simple ftp/s server.  If something is broken, go to GitHub and report the issue. Don't complain about it in the comments.
it just works
Fantastic
FTP needs to be started when app is open, and please add SD write permission for Android 7.1.1
Fast, easy to use and simple. Awesome. Love it :3
Nice tool, works as expected. It would be nice to have possibility to see logs directly inside the application sib-view.
I'm giving it five stars because I did not find anything better. This is the best FTP/SFTP server among apps I have tried so far.
Great devs! Keep it up!!
